name: Mother Care Child Development Society
briefDescription: The society also helps the women in enhancing skills in the urban and rural areas. The society helps in providing and arranging need based training by organizing the Awareness Camps against environment pollution. The society has also worked for improving the Health and Family welfare of the rural people.The society also aims to educate children living in slum areas to make them literate and improve their personality development and hence improving their overall development. As only the educated parents can understand the importance of education for their children, the society has arranged different camps to provide education to all the needy children as well as their parents, to make them aware of education.
